data.text: @rolandfuffy @EthicalSkeptic Four doctors I went to said it was.  They just didn’t know what to do for it except steroid shots then pills.  They told me that according to my blood work my immune system was attacking itself. Ended up with a stroke.

@LocalRachel @EthicalSkeptic COVID + 1/1/22.  Long COVID vic here.  Have fatigue, muscle weakness, brain fog and mini stroke.  Was Healthy, active & rarely got sick.  This knocked me for a loop.  Unvaxxed, 69yo.  (Meyers Cocktail IV’s are helping!)
